Package org.jdesktop.swingx.icon

Class PlayIcon

java.lang.Object
org.jdesktop.swingx.icon.ArrowIcon
org.jdesktop.swingx.icon.PlayIcon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Icon, UIResource, SwingConstants, SizingConstants
public class PlayIcon extends ArrowIcon
Rendering a Play icon (used for Players). Can be filled with any color, default is component foreground (black).
Author:
EUG https://github.com/homebeaver/
